flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: first you need dorox,glue,and water. All you need to do is take a spoon full of dorox put it in some thing then put glue in with the dorox next poor a table spoon of water poor it in mix it up and add 1 more spoon full of glue and mix that up.Now its ready to launch but make sure you launch it outside and hit your target.
guide.introduction_rendered: first you need dorox,glue,and water. All you need to do is take a spoon full of dorox put it in some thing then put glue in with the dorox next poor a table spoon of water poor it in mix it up and add 1 more spoon full of glue and mix that up.Now its ready to launch but make sure you launch it outside and hit your target.
guide.summary: This is a project for giving a good prank on april fools it is quick and easy all you need is 3 things
guide.title: How to give a good prank
